titleStmt.title: Fames memoriall, or The Earle of Deuonshire deceased with his honourable life, peacefull end, and solemne funerall.
titleStmt.author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Bradock] for Christopher Purset, dwelling at the signe of the Mary Magdalens head neer Staple Inne in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The Earle of Deuonshire deceased.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
